description: Base GTO task repository - Group Discussion and Lecturette topics

tasks.title: Impact of Social Media on Youth
tasks.description: Discuss the positive and negative impacts of social media on today's youth and suggest measures for responsible usage.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Climate Change and National Security
tasks.description: Analyze how climate change poses threats to national security and discuss potential mitigation strategies.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Women in Combat Roles
tasks.description: Discuss the advantages and challenges of inducting women in combat roles in the armed forces.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Digital India Initiative
tasks.description: Evaluate the progress and challenges of the Digital India initiative and its impact on rural development.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Leadership Lessons from History
tasks.description: Discuss key leadership lessons that can be learned from historical military leaders and their relevance today.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Artificial Intelligence in Warfare
tasks.description: Analyze the ethical implications and strategic advantages of using AI in modern warfare.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Youth Unemployment in India
tasks.description: Discuss the causes of youth unemployment in India and suggest practical solutions.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Border Security Challenges
tasks.description: Examine the current challenges in securing India's borders and propose effective strategies.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Sports and Nation Building
tasks.description: Discuss how sports can contribute to nation building and national integration.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Cyber Security Threats
tasks.description: Analyze emerging cyber security threats to national infrastructure and discuss countermeasures.
tasks.instructions: Engage in a constructive group discussion. Listen to others, present your viewpoints clearly, and work towards a consensus.

tasks.title: Leadership in Crisis Situations
tasks.description: Deliver a 3-minute talk on the qualities required for effective leadership during crisis situations.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: Importance of Physical Fitness
tasks.description: Speak about the importance of physical fitness for armed forces personnel.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: Role of Technology in Modern Warfare
tasks.description: Discuss how technology has transformed modern warfare and future implications.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: Importance of Discipline
tasks.description: Explain the significance of discipline in personal and professional life.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: India's Space Program
tasks.description: Talk about India's achievements in space exploration and future missions.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: Teamwork and Cooperation
tasks.description: Discuss the importance of teamwork and cooperation in achieving common goals.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: Environmental Conservation
tasks.description: Speak about the need for environmental conservation and individual responsibility.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: Courage and Determination
tasks.description: Discuss how courage and determination are essential qualities for success.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: India-China Relations
tasks.description: Analyze the current state of India-China relations and future prospects.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.

tasks.title: Time Management
tasks.description: Explain the importance of time management and strategies for effective time utilization.
tasks.instructions: Prepare and deliver a structured 3-minute presentation. Include introduction, main points, and conclusion.
